newsitem.title: LITHUANIA: RADIO HEADLINES AT NOON - MAY 20.
newsitem.headline: RADIO HEADLINES AT NOON - MAY 20.

text.p: These were the main news headlines reported by Lithuania's radio M1 Plus at noon on Tuesday. Reuters has not verified these reports and cannot vouch for their accuracy.
- Italian President Oscar Luigi Scalfaro begins his official two-day visit to Lithuania today.

- Lithuanian President Algirdas Brazauskas visited the region near Vistytis lake which is a major obstacle to the demarcation of the border between Lithuania and Russia. Lithuania wants the border line go through the middle of the lake while Russia wants to hold the bigger part of it.
